issue.title: [Java] Java compilation failures on master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5750](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5750). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Two Flight-related Java patches were merged today and we have compilation failures on master now:

https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/551015006#L956

comments.body:
